MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Thanks to Queensway and Vivienne, the Mist Monsters were banished.

The girls who had been attacked stared in dismay at the scene.
 Paddington and I rushed to them.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Paddington
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Are you hurt?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Oh, yes... um... I'm fine.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Queensway
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: From the looks of it, you both appear to be unharmed.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Vivienne
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I'm glad we made it in time.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Oh, um... First of all, you've saved us from a dangerous situation,
thank you very much!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
So, um... I don't know where I am...
And may I know who are you people...?

Upon seeing the girl's reaction, Paddington and I looked at each other.
Seems like these girls were--

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Paddington
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Could it be that... you two are otherworldly guests?

We've encountered similar phenomena on several occasions before,
so we expected that you two might be--

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: O-Otherworld... Then that mirror really worked...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Yeah, it looks like it really did fulfil my joke wish...
though I wish I would have been made a warrior anyway...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Vivienne
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Um, what is this mirror?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ah, yes, actually--

The girls explained to me how they came to this world.
The mirror of the moon, which grants wishes, and...
the mirror of the mist. Both are worrisome.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: No way, I never thought this would happen...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Paddington
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Rest assured, the two of you will be protected by the
Special Steel Squad under full responsibility!
Isn't that right, Conductor?

Yes, of course.
And we will spare no effort to help you get back to your world.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Special, Steel Squad...?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Paddington
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes, we are the Special Steel Squad--
I then explained to the girls about who we are.

About this world and the Special Steel Squad.
I also briefly explained about the Mist Monsters we just encountered,
and so on.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Hah--ha... Mist Monsters in a world covered in Mist...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Amazing, doesn't this all sound like it's a complete fantasy?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Paddington
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
The person in command of the SSS is him, Conductor!
And my name is Paddington, Conductor's second-in-command!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Paddington
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: And these two are Train Knights are members of the SSS...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Queensway
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Pleasure to meet you, I'm Queensway.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Vivienne
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Vivienne, nice to meet you.

That concludes our introductions.
I haven't heard your names yet though...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Oh, that's true! I'm terribly sorry!

Looking flustered, she gave a deep bow.
My sincerest regrets if I scared her.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: My name is Kokura Asahi. And this is...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ...Okura Risona.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Paddington
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
So, to Miss Asahi, and Miss Risona, 
I would like to reassure you once again.
There is a way for the two of you to return to your original world!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Really? That's very good...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I'm a little relieved...

There have been several cases like this in the past.
It's almost as if we've become slightly used
to returning visitors to the world they came from.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Paddington
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: So, let's get started on the preparations.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Oh, wait! Actually, two other people 
might have come to our world as well...
I see, I understand.
Me, Queensway and Vivienne will search the area.
Paddington, please take Asahi and Risona to the Mist Train.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Paddington
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes, affirmative.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Paddington
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Now then, Miss Asahi and Miss Risona, this way please!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ah, yes!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Wait, what are you doing?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Risona, what's going on?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I mean, why did you say the name 'Kokura Asahi'?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Shouldn't you be using real name... 'Yuusei Okura' at this moment? Your surname would have told everyone that we are brother and sister.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: You should have told them that even though you're dressed like this, you're still a man.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: But how would people in this world be able to tell the difference between men and women just by my name? Queensway wouldn't know which one it was if she only heard my first name.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Mmmm, that's true, but... The point is that you should have told them your gender. I don't care what happens to you later if they find out and think you're a hentai who hid your real gender.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Ugh, hentai... No, the first person asked me to dress up as a woman
was none other than you, Risona.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes, that's true... It seems like a really long time ago.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: But even you bro, is completely on board now, right?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Yes, I'm actually a bit scared myself.
Frankly, I introduced myself as Asahi Kokura just now without even thinking.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Risona Okura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Perhaps it's too late now...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Paddington
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: What's wrong? Something happened to you two-?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Asahi Kokura
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Nothing, we're on our way!
